name: Echoed World (itch)
description:
The game was created as a student project and thus is not very lengthy. Our team decided to put it out for free to get something every starting developer needs – feedback. Most members of our team had no previous experience with game development and Echoed World was made during a few months of tutored game development classes. Our main goal is to show, what can be achieved with a group of talented, yet inexperienced people in a relatively short amount of time.

We hope that you will enjoy this short, yet sweet adventure.
All the feedback we get on Echoed World will push our team even further!

Supported using public funding by Slovak Arts Council.
The Slovak Arts Council is also the main partner of Echoed World.
